chapter.title: Widget Packing
chapter.para: As you're writing an EWL application you will need to start laying out the widgets into the different boxes. To do so, you'll need a bit of information on how EWL packs widgets together.
There are two main orientations for containers in EWL, vertical or horizontal. The different orientations can be most easily seen in .

In EWL, each widget has an amount of padding around the widget and an inset set into the widget. This is seen in the below in .
